comments.body: Consider specifying the type of exception expected in Assert.Throws to make the test more precise and informative.
Throw a more specific exception with a descriptive message, e.g., ArgumentException, to improve error handling and debugging.
Throw a more specific exception with a descriptive message, e.g., InvalidOperationException, to improve error handling and debugging.
It seems HeapSize is increased too late which could lead to incorrect behavior. Consider incrementing HeapSize before inserting into the array to prevent inserting in the wrong index.
Using an init value of (0,0) in this.Heap[this.HeapSize] could lead to incorrect calculations. Consider initializing with a meaningful default or refactoring.
Heapify should maintain the heap structure correctly. Ensure elements are being moved correctly and consider boundary checks to avoid unintended index errors.
